name: 王耀德
objective: 讓同學了解電磁學之基本觀念與應用，課程內容將包括：1.向量分析 2.靜電學 3.鏡磁學 4.物質內的電、磁場 5.時變場與守恆律 6.電磁波 7.傳輸線與波導 8.天線與輻射
schedule:
week 1: Introduction
week 2~3: Vector analysis
week 4~5: Electrostatics
week 6~7: Special Techniques
week 8~9: Electric Fields in Matter
(week 8 or 9: midterm exam.)
week 10~12: Magnetostatics
week 12~14: Magnetic Fields in Matter
week 15~16: Electrodynamics
week 17: Conservation Laws
week 18: final exam.
scorePolicy:
quiz: 10 x 3
midterm: 25
final: 25
homework: 15
participation: 5
materials:
main text: Introduction to Electrodynamics, 3rd ed., by David J. Griffiths
for applications and practices: Field and Wave Electromagnetics, 2nd ed., by David K. Cheng
